Detailed Description

Fourier Domain Preconditioner for Tomography step.

cfft2s(A,-1) and cfft2s(A,1) are hermitian ffts because they have the same scale.

Function Documentation

csp* fdpcg_saselect ( long  nx,
long  ny,
double  dx,
LOC_T *  saloc,
double *  saa 
)

Create aperture selection function that selects the gradients for valid subapertures from ground layer xloc (or ploc). 

00040                                                                           {
00041     const long threas=1;
00042     cmat *xsel=cnew(nx,ny);
00043     cfft2plan(xsel,-1);
00044     PCMAT(xsel,pxsel);
00045     double dx1=1./dx;
00046     long offx=nx/2+saloc->dx*0.5*dx1;
00047     long offy=ny/2+saloc->dx*0.5*dx1;
00048     for(long isa=0; isa<saloc->nloc; isa++){
00049     if(saa[isa]>0.9){
00050         long ix=(saloc->locx[isa])*dx1+offx;//subaperture center.
00051         long iy=(saloc->locy[isa])*dx1+offy;
00052         pxsel[iy][ix]=1;
00053     }
00054     }
00055     cfftshift(xsel);
00056     cfft2(xsel,-1);
00057     cfftshift(xsel);
00058     cscale(xsel,1./(double)(nx*ny));//cancel FFT effect.
00059     double xselc=creal(pxsel[ny/2][nx/2])*threas;//Fourier center
00060    
00061     for(long ix=0; ix<nx; ix++){
00062     for(long iy=0; iy<ny; iy++){
00063         if(cabs(pxsel[iy][ix])<xselc){
00064         pxsel[iy][ix]=0;
00065         }
00066     }
00067     }
00068     csp *sel=cspconvolvop(xsel);
00069     cfree(xsel);
00070     return sel;
00071 }

long* fdpcg_perm ( const long *  nx,
const long *  ny,
const long *  os,
int  nps 
)

Create a permulation acting on xhat (fft of x on xloc) so that points of the same spatial frequency in all layers are grouped together.

In this implementation, it implies that all the screens have the same spatial sampling frequency, or they have the same tot spatial size.

The ray tracing couples the screens but only on points with same or harmonic spatial frequencies. Group them together. 

00084                                                                          {
00085     long nx2[nps],ny2[nps];
00086     long noff[nps];
00087     long xloctot=0;
00088     for(long ips=0; ips<nps; ips++){
00089     nx2[ips]=nx[ips]/2;
00090     ny2[ips]=ny[ips]/2;
00091     noff[ips]=xloctot;
00092     xloctot+=nx[ips]*ny[ips];
00093     if(os[ips]>os[0]){
00094         error("Layer %ld os is greater than ground\n", ips);
00095     }
00096     }
00097     long *perm=calloc(xloctot, sizeof(long));
00098     long use_os=os[0];
00099     long adim=nx[0]/use_os;
00100     long osx=nx[0]/2;
00101     long count=0;
00102     for(long iy=-adim/2; iy<adim/2; iy++){
00103     for(long ix=-adim/2; ix<adim/2; ix++){
00104         //(ix,iy) is the frequency in SALOC grid.
00105         for(long juse_os=0; juse_os<use_os; juse_os++){
00106         long jy=(iy+adim*juse_os);
00107         if(jy>=osx) jy-=nx[0];
00108         for(long iuse_os=0; iuse_os<use_os; iuse_os++){
00109             long jx=(ix+adim*iuse_os);
00110             if(jx>=osx) jx-=nx[0];
00111 
00112             //jx, jy is the frequency in XLOC grid.
00113             for(long ips=0; ips<nps; ips++){
00114             //this layer has such freq.
00115             if(jy>=-ny2[ips] && jy<ny2[ips] 
00116                && jx>=-nx2[ips] && jx<nx2[ips]){
00117                 perm[count]=noff[ips]
00118                 +(jx+nx2[ips])+(jy+ny2[ips])*nx[ips];
00119                 count++;
00120             }
00121             }
00122         }
00123         }
00124     }
00125     }
00126     return perm;
00127 }

void fdpcg_g ( cmat **  gx,
cmat **  gy,
long  nx,
long  ny,
double  dx,
double  dsa 
)

Compute gradient operator in Fourier domain. 

00132                                                                            {
00133     long os=(long)(dsa/dx);
00134     if(fabs(dsa-dx*os)>1.e-10){
00135     error("dsa must be multiple of dx");
00136     }
00137  
00138     double *wt=alloca(sizeof(double)*(os+1));
00139     double *st=alloca(sizeof(double)*(os+1));
00140     //Trapzoidal weights for averaging.
00141     wt[os]=wt[0]=0.5/(double)os/dsa;
00142     for(long ios=1; ios<os; ios++){
00143     wt[ios]=1./(double)os/dsa;
00144     }
00145     for(long ios=0; ios<os+1; ios++){
00146     st[ios]=ios*dx;
00147     }
00148     long ny2=ny/2;
00149     long nx2=nx/2;
00150     dcomplex cf=2*M_PI*I;
00151     double dfy=1/(ny*dx);
00152     double dfx=1/(nx*dx);
00153     *gx=cnew(nx*ny,1);
00154     *gy=cnew(nx*ny,1);
00155     dcomplex *pgx=(*gx)->p;
00156     dcomplex *pgy=(*gy)->p;
00157     double dsa2=dsa*0.5;
00158     for(long iy=0; iy<ny; iy++){
00159     double fy=(double)(iy-ny2)*dfy;
00160     for(long ix=0; ix<nx; ix++){
00161         double fx=(double)(ix-nx2)*dfx;
00162         dcomplex tx=0;
00163         dcomplex ty=0;
00164         dcomplex offset=1;
00165         if(os>1){
00166         offset=cexp(-cf*(fx+fy)*dsa2);//shift by half a subaperture
00167         }
00168         for(int ios=0; ios<os+1; ios++){
00169         tx+=wt[ios]*(cexp(cf*(fx*dsa+fy*st[ios]))-cexp(cf*(fy*st[ios])));
00170         ty+=wt[ios]*(cexp(cf*(fy*dsa+fx*st[ios]))-cexp(cf*(fx*st[ios])));
00171         }
00172         pgx[ix+iy*nx]=offset*tx;
00173         pgy[ix+iy*nx]=offset*ty;
00174     }
00175     }
00176 }

csp* fdpcg_prop ( long  nps,
const long *  os,
long  nxg,
double  dx,
double *  dispx,
double *  dispy 
)

Propagate operator for nlayer screens to ground of size nxg*nxg, sampling dx, with displacement of dispx, dispy. 

00182                                                                                             {
00183     long nxi[nps],nxi2[nps],nxi3[nps],noff[nps];
00184     long nxtot=0;
00185     double dk=1./(nxg*dx);
00186     for(long ips=0; ips<nps; ips++){
00187     nxi[ips]=nxg/os[0]*os[ips];
00188     nxi2[ips]=nxi[ips]/2;
00189     nxi3[ips]=nxi[ips]/2+nxi[ips];
00190     noff[ips]=nxtot;
00191     nxtot+=nxi[ips]*nxi[ips];
00192     }
00193     long nxg2=nxg/2;
00194     /*We build the transposed matrix.*/
00195     csp *propt=cspnew(nxtot,nxg*nxg,nxg*nxg*nps);
00196     long *pp=propt->p;
00197     long *pi=propt->i;
00198     dcomplex *px=propt->x;
00199     long count=0;
00200     dcomplex cf=2*M_PI*I;
00201     double cfr=2*M_PI;
00202     for(long iy=0; iy<nxg; iy++){
00203     for(long ix=0; ix<nxg; ix++){
00204         double fxg=(ix-nxg2)*dk;//spatial frequency in ground layer.
00205         double fyg=(iy-nxg2)*dk;
00206         long icol=ix+iy*nxg;
00207         pp[icol]=count;
00208         for(long ips=0; ips<nps; ips++){
00209         long jx=((ix-nxg2)+nxi3[ips])%nxi[ips];//map to layer ips.
00210         long jy=((iy-nxg2)+nxi3[ips])%nxi[ips];//map to layer ips.
00211         double fx=(jx-nxi2[ips])*dk;//spatial frequency in plane ips.
00212         double fy=(jy-nxi2[ips])*dk;
00213         pi[count]=jx+jy*nxi[ips]+noff[ips];
00214         dcomplex shift=cexp(cf*(fx*dispx[ips]+fy*dispy[ips]));
00215         switch(os[0]/os[ips]){
00216         case 1:
00217             px[count]=conj(shift);
00218             break;
00219         case 2:
00220             {
00221             /*
00222               2010-05-28:
00223               We are using hermitian FFT in that FFT'=IFFT so that
00224               we can apply G'G. We need to multiply 0.5 to account
00225               for this scaling effect.
00226             */
00227             /*
00228               dcomplex shiftx=cexp(cf*(fxg*dx));
00229               dcomplex shifty=cexp(cf*(fyg*dx));
00230               px[count]=conj(shift*(1+0.5*shiftx+0.5*conj(shiftx))
00231               *(1+0.5*shifty+0.5*conj(shifty)));
00232               //the following is equivalent.
00233               */
00234             px[count]=conj(shift*(1+cos(cfr*(fxg*dx)))*(1+cos(cfr*(fyg*dx))))*0.5;
00235             }
00236             break;
00237         default:
00238             error("Invalid\n");
00239         }
00240         count++;
00241         }
00242     }
00243     }
00244     pp[nxg*nxg]=count;
00245     //we put conj above because csptrans applies a conjugation.
00246     csp *propf=csptrans(propt);
00247     cspfree(propt);
00248     return propf;
00249 }

FDPCG_T* fdpcg_prepare ( const PARMS_T *  parms,
const RECON_T *  recon,
const POWFS_T *  powfs 
)

Prepare data for Tomography Fourier Domain Preconditioner. 

00253                                                                                         {
00254     LOC_T **xloc=recon->xloc;
00255     int hipowfs=-1;
00256     for(int ipowfs=0; ipowfs<parms->npowfs; ipowfs++){
00257     if(!parms->powfs[ipowfs].lo){
00258         if(hipowfs==-1){
00259         hipowfs=ipowfs;
00260         }else{
00261         error("Multiple High order powfs found\n");
00262         }
00263     }
00264     }
00265     LOC_T *saloc=powfs[hipowfs].saloc;
00266     const double hs=parms->powfs[hipowfs].hs;
00267     const long nsa=powfs[hipowfs].pts->nsa;
00268     const long nps=recon->npsr;
00269     long os[nps];//oversampling ratio of each layer.
00270     const long* nx=recon->xloc_nx;
00271     const long* ny=recon->xloc_ny;
00272     const double *ht=parms->atmr.ht;
00273     long nxtot=0;
00274     for(long ips=0; ips<nps; ips++){
00275     os[ips]=(long)round(saloc->dx/(xloc[ips]->dx/(1.-ht[ips]/hs)));
00276     nxtot+=nx[ips]*ny[ips];
00277     }
00278     //Subaperture selection operator
00279     csp *sel=fdpcg_saselect(nx[0],ny[0],xloc[0]->dx, 
00280                 saloc, powfs[hipowfs].pts->area);
00281     if(parms->save.setup){
00282     cspwrite(sel,"%s/fdpcg_sel.bin.gz",dirsetup);
00283     }
00284     //Gradient operator.
00285     cmat *gx, *gy;
00286     fdpcg_g(&gx,&gy,nx[0],ny[0],xloc[0]->dx,saloc->dx);//tested ok.
00287     if(parms->save.setup){
00288     cwrite(gx,"%s/fdpcg_gx.bin.gz",dirsetup);
00289     cwrite(gy,"%s/fdpcg_gy.bin.gz",dirsetup);
00290     }
00291     //Concatenate invpsd;
00292     dcomplex *invpsd=calloc(nxtot, sizeof(dcomplex));
00293     long offset=0;
00294     if(parms->atmr.invpsd){
00295     //forward matrix uses inverse PSD. we use here also.
00296     for(long ips=0; ips<nps; ips++){
00297         dmat *tmp=ddup(recon->invpsd->p[ips]);
00298         dfftshift(tmp);
00299         dscale(tmp,(double)(nx[ips]*ny[ips]));//cancel the scaling applied in invpsd routine.
00300         for(long i=0; i<nx[ips]*ny[ips]; i++){
00301         invpsd[offset+i]=tmp->p[i];
00302         }
00303         offset+=nx[ips]*ny[ips];
00304         dfree(tmp);
00305     }
00306     }else{//forward matrix uses biharmonic approx. We use here also.
00307     for(long ips=0; ips<nps; ips++){
00308         cmat *psd=cnew(nx[ips],ny[ips]);
00309         cfft2plan(psd,-1);
00310         dsp *tmp=sptmulsp(recon->L2->p[ips+nps*ips], 
00311                  recon->L2->p[ips+nps*ips]);
00312         for(long irow=tmp->p[0]; irow<tmp->p[1]; irow++){
00313         psd->p[tmp->i[irow]]=tmp->x[irow];
00314         }
00315         cfft2(psd,-1);
00316         cfftshift(psd);
00317         const double eps=2.220446049250313e-16;//look for a way to obtain this automatically.
00318         double max;
00319         maxmincmp(psd->p,psd->nx*psd->ny,&max,NULL,NULL);
00320         max=max*sqrt(eps);
00321         for(long i=0; i<nx[ips]*ny[ips]; i++){
00322         invpsd[offset+i]=creal(psd->p[i])+max;
00323         }
00324         offset+=nx[ips]*ny[ips];
00325         cfree(psd);
00326     }
00327     }
00328 
00329     //make it sparse diagonal operator
00330     csp *Mhat=cspnewdiag(nxtot,invpsd,1);
00331     free(invpsd);
00332     if(parms->save.setup){
00333     cspwrite(Mhat,"%s/fdpcg_invpsd.bin.gz",dirsetup);
00334     }
00335 
00336     csp *Mmid=NULL;
00337     //Compute gx'*sel'*sel*gx+gy'*sel'*sel*gy as Mmid
00338     for(int i=0; i<2; i++){
00339     cmat *g;
00340     if(i==0){
00341         g=gx;
00342     }else{
00343         g=gy;
00344     }
00345     csp *tmp=cspdup(sel);
00346     cspmuldiag(tmp,g->p,1);
00347     csp *tmp2=csptmulsp(tmp,tmp);
00348     cspadd(&Mmid, tmp2);
00349     cspfree(tmp);
00350     cspfree(tmp2);
00351     }
00352     cfree(gx);
00353     cfree(gy);
00354     cspfree(sel);
00355     double dispx[nps];
00356     double dispy[nps];
00357     //Ray tracing operator for each WFS
00358     if(parms->save.setup){
00359     cspwrite(Mmid,"%s/fdpcg_Mmid",dirsetup);
00360     }
00361     for(int jwfs=0; jwfs<parms->powfs[hipowfs].nwfs; jwfs++){
00362     //for(int jwfs=1; jwfs<2; jwfs++){
00363     int iwfs=parms->powfs[hipowfs].wfs[jwfs];
00364     //Use cartesian component of SANEA (not radial/azimuthal).
00365     dmat *saneai=spdiag(recon->saneai->p[iwfs+iwfs*parms->nwfs]);
00366     double nea2_sum=0;
00367     long count=0;
00368     for(int isa=0; isa<nsa; isa++){
00369         if(powfs[hipowfs].pts->area[isa]>0.9){
00370         nea2_sum+=1./(saneai->p[isa])+1./(saneai->p[isa+nsa]);
00371         count++;
00372         }
00373     }
00374     dfree(saneai);
00375     double neai=sqrt(nea2_sum/count/2);
00376     info("sanea used for wfs %d is %g mas\n",iwfs, 206265000*neai);
00377     for(long ips=0; ips<nps; ips++){
00378         /*
00379           2010-05-28:
00380           The cone effect cancels with the cone coordinate. so we are like
00381           doing parallel beam propagation. Removed scaling by 1/(1-ht[ips]/hs);
00382         */
00383         dispx[ips]=ht[ips]*parms->wfs[iwfs].thetax;
00384         dispy[ips]=ht[ips]*parms->wfs[iwfs].thetay;
00385     }
00386     csp *propx=fdpcg_prop(nps,os,nx[0],xloc[0]->dx,dispx,dispy);
00387     if(parms->save.setup){
00388         cspwrite(propx,"%s/fdpcg_prop_wfs%d.bin.gz",dirsetup,iwfs);
00389     }
00390     //need to test this in spatial domain.
00391     cspscale(propx,1./neai);//prop is not real for off axis wfs.
00392     //Compute propx'*Mmid*propx and add to Mhat;
00393     csp *tmp=cspmulsp(Mmid,propx);
00394     csp *tmp2=csptmulsp(propx,tmp);
00395     cspfree(tmp);
00396     cspfree(propx);
00397     cspadd(&Mhat,tmp2);
00398     cspfree(tmp2);
00399     }
00400   
00401     cspfree(Mmid);
00402     cspdropeps(Mhat);
00403     cspsym(Mhat);
00404     if(parms->save.setup){
00405     cspwrite(Mhat,"%s/fdpcg_Mhat",dirsetup);
00406     }
00407     //Now invert each block.
00408     //First blocksize.
00409     long bs=0;
00410     for(long ips=0; ips<nps; ips++){
00411     if(os[0]==2){
00412         if(os[ips]==2){
00413         bs+=4;
00414         }else if(os[ips]==1){
00415         bs+=1;
00416         }else{
00417         error("Invalid");
00418         }
00419     }else{
00420         bs+=1;
00421     }
00422     }
00423     long nb=Mhat->m/bs;
00424     info("Block size is %ld, there are %ld blocks\n",bs,nb);
00425     //Permutation vector
00426     FDPCG_T *fdpcg=calloc(1, sizeof(FDPCG_T));
00427     long *perm=fdpcg_perm(nx,ny,os, nps);
00428     csp *Mhatp=cspperm(Mhat,0,perm,perm);//forward permutation.
00429     cspfree(Mhat);
00430 #if PRE_PERMUT == 1
00431     csp *Minvp=cspinvbdiag(Mhatp,bs);
00432     cspfree(Mhatp);
00433     csp *Minv=cspperm(Minvp,1,perm, perm);//revert permutation
00434     cspfree(Minvp);
00435     free(perm);
00436     fdpcg->Minv=Minv;
00437     if(parms->save.setup){
00438     cspwrite(Minv,"%s/fdpcg_Minv",dirsetup);
00439     }
00440 #else
00441     fdpcg->perm=perm;
00442     fdpcg->Mbinv=cspblockextract(Mhatp,bs);
00443     for(long ib=0; ib<nb; ib++){
00444     cinv_inplace(fdpcg->Mbinv->p[ib]);
00445     }
00446 #endif
00447     fdpcg->xhat=cnew(nxtot,1);
00448     fdpcg->xhat2=cnew(nxtot,1);
00449     fdpcg->xhati=ccellnew(nps,1);
00450     fdpcg->xhat2i=ccellnew(nps,1);
00451     fdpcg->scale=calloc(nps,sizeof(double));
00452     offset=0;
00453     for(int ips=0; ips<nps; ips++){
00454     fdpcg->xhati->p[ips]=cnew_data(fdpcg->xhat->p+offset,nx[ips],ny[ips]);
00455     fdpcg->xhat2i->p[ips]=cnew_data(fdpcg->xhat2->p+offset,nx[ips],ny[ips]);
00456     cfft2plan(fdpcg->xhati->p[ips],-1);
00457     cfft2plan(fdpcg->xhat2i->p[ips],1);
00458     fdpcg->scale[ips]=1./(double)(nx[ips]*ny[ips]);
00459     offset+=nx[ips]*ny[ips];
00460     }
00461 
00462     fdpcg->nxtot=nxtot;
00463     return fdpcg;
00464 }

static void fdpcg_fft ( void *  p  )  [static]

Copy x vector and do FFT on each layer. 

00476                               {
00477     thread_info *info=p;
00478     int ips;
00479     FDPCG_T *fdpcg=info->fdpcg;
00480     int nps=fdpcg->xhati->nx;
00481     ccell *xhati=fdpcg->xhati;
00482     const dcell *xin=info->xin;
00483  repeat:
00484     LOCK(info->lock);
00485     ips=info->ips++;
00486     UNLOCK(info->lock);
00487     if(ips<nps){
00488     for(long i=0; i<xhati->p[ips]->nx*xhati->p[ips]->ny; i++){
00489         xhati->p[ips]->p[i]=xin->p[ips]->p[i];
00490     }
00491     //Apply FFT. first fftshift is not necessary.
00492     //cfftshift(xhati->p[ips]);//enable this needs enable the one in fdpcg_ifft.
00493     //cfft2(xhati->p[ips],-1);
00494     cfft2s(xhati->p[ips],-1);
00495     cfftshift(xhati->p[ips]);
00496     goto repeat;
00497     }
00498 }

static void fdpcg_mulblock ( void *  p  )  [static]

Multiply each block in pthreads. 

00502                                    {
00503     thread_info *info=p;
00504     int ib;
00505     FDPCG_T *fdpcg=info->fdpcg;
00506     long bs=fdpcg->Mbinv->p[0]->nx;
00507     long nb=fdpcg->nxtot/bs;
00508     cmat *xhat=fdpcg->xhat;

00512     ib=info->ib++;
00513     UNLOCK(info->lock);
00514     if(ib<nb){
00515     cmulvec(xhat->p+ib*bs, fdpcg->Mbinv->p[ib], xhat2->p+ib*bs,1);
00516     goto repeat;
00517     }
00518 }

static void fdpcg_ifft ( void *  p  )  [static]

Inverse FFT for each block. 

00522                                {
00523     thread_info *info=p;
00524     int ips;
00525     FDPCG_T *fdpcg=info->fdpcg;
00526     int nps=fdpcg->xhati->nx;
00527     ccell *xhat2i=fdpcg->xhat2i;
00528     dcell *xout=info->xout;
00529     const dcell *xin=info->xin;
00530  repeat:
00531     LOCK(info->lock);
00532     ips=info->ips++;
00533     UNLOCK(info->lock);
00534     if(ips<nps){
00535     cfftshift(xhat2i->p[ips]);
00536     cfft2s(xhat2i->p[ips],1);
00537     //cfftshift(xhat2i->p[ips]);//enable this needs enable the one in fdpcg_fft.
00538     if(!xout->p[ips]){
00539         xout->p[ips]=dnew(xin->p[ips]->nx,xin->p[ips]->ny);
00540     }
00541     dmat *xhat2ii=dref_reshape(xout->p[ips],xhat2i->p[ips]->nx,xhat2i->p[ips]->ny);
00542     //creal2d(&xhat2ii,0,xhat2i->p[ips],fdpcg->scale[ips]);
00543     creal2d(&xhat2ii,0,xhat2i->p[ips],1);
00544     dfree(xhat2ii);
00545     goto repeat;
00546     }
00547 }

void fdpcg_precond ( dcell **  xout,
const void *  A,
const dcell *  xin 
)

Apply the Fourier domain preconditioner.

Preconditioner solves xout=M^-1*xin where M is the preconditioner matrix. Here M^-1 is applied in Fourier Domain via xout=IFFT(M*FFT(xin)); 

00554                                                                  {
00555     const RECON_T *recon=(RECON_T*)A;
00556     if(xin->ny!=1){
00557     error("Invalid\n");
00558     }
00559     FDPCG_T *fdpcg=recon->fdpcg;
00560     long nxtot=fdpcg->nxtot;
00561     cmat *xhat=fdpcg->xhat;
00562     cmat *xhat2=fdpcg->xhat2;
00563     thread_info info;
00564     info.ips=0;
00565     info.ib=0;
00566     PINIT(info.lock);
00567     info.fdpcg=recon->fdpcg;
00568     info.xin=xin;
00569     if(!*xout){
00570     *xout=dcellnew(xin->nx, xin->ny);
00571     }
00572     info.xout=*xout;
00573     //apply forward FFT
00574     CALL(fdpcg_fft,&info,recon->nthread);
00575 
00576     if(recon->fdpcg->Minv){
00577     czero(xhat2);
00578     cspmulvec(xhat2->p, recon->fdpcg->Minv, xhat->p, 1);
00579     }else{
00580     //permute xhat and put into xhat2
00581     cvecperm(xhat2->p,xhat->p,recon->fdpcg->perm,nxtot);
00582     czero(xhat);
00583     CALL(fdpcg_mulblock,&info,recon->nthread);
00584     //permute back to have natural order.
00585     cvecpermi(xhat2->p,xhat->p,fdpcg->perm,nxtot);
00586     }
00587     info.ips=0;
00588     //Apply inverse FFT
00589     CALL(fdpcg_ifft,&info,recon->nthread);
00590 }

void fdpcg_free ( FDPCG_T *  fdpcg  ) 

Free fdpcg related data structs. 

00594                                {
00595     if(!fdpcg) return;
00596     cspfree(fdpcg->Minv);
00597     if(fdpcg->Mbinv){
00598     free(fdpcg->perm);
00599     ccellfree(fdpcg->Mbinv);
00600     }
00601     
00602     for(int ips=0; ips<fdpcg->xhati->nx; ips++){
00603     /*The pointers are owned by xhat, we set to NULL so
00604       ccellfree won't try to free the memory*/
00605     fdpcg->xhat2i->p[ips]->p=NULL;
00606     fdpcg->xhati->p[ips]->p=NULL;
00607     }
00608     ccellfree(fdpcg->xhati);
00609     ccellfree(fdpcg->xhat2i);
00610     cfree(fdpcg->xhat);
00611     cfree(fdpcg->xhat2);
00612     free(fdpcg->scale);
00613     free(fdpcg);
00614 }
